00030 inline double timestamp()
00031 {
00032     boost::posix_time::ptime MyTime = boost::posix_time::microsec_clock::local_time();
00033     boost::posix_time::time_duration Duration =
00034         MyTime - boost::posix_time::time_from_string("1970-01-01 00:00:00.000");
00035     double sec = double(Duration.hours()) * 3600. +
00036                  double(Duration.minutes()) * 60. +
00037                  double(Duration.seconds()) +
00038                  double(Duration.fractional_seconds()) / (pow(10., Duration.num_fractional_digits()));
00039     return sec;
00040 }
00041

00049 class stats : public singleton<stats>
00050 {
00051     friend class singleton<stats>;
00052 
00053     unsigned reads, writes;                     // number of operations
00054     int64_t volume_read, volume_written;          // number of bytes read/written
00055     double t_reads, t_writes;                   // seconds spent in operations
00056     double p_reads, p_writes;                   // seconds spent in parallel operations
00057     double p_begin_read, p_begin_write;         // start time of parallel operation
00058     double p_ios;                               // seconds spent in all parallel I/O operations (read and write)
00059     double p_begin_io;
00060     double t_waits, p_waits;                    // seconds spent waiting for completion of I/O operations
00061     double p_begin_wait;
00062     int acc_reads, acc_writes;                  // number of requests, participating in parallel operation
00063     int acc_ios;
00064     int acc_waits;
00065     double last_reset;
00066     boost::mutex read_mutex, write_mutex, io_mutex, wait_mutex;
00067 
00068     stats() {}
00069     ~stats() {}
00070 public:
00071     class scoped_write_timer
00072     {
00073         typedef unsigned_type size_type;
00074 
00075         bool running;
00076 
00077     public:
00078         scoped_write_timer(size_type size)
00079                 :running(false)
00080         {
00081             start(size);
00082         }
00083 
00084         ~scoped_write_timer()
00085         {
00086             stop();
00087         }
00088 
00089         void start(size_type size)
00090         {
00091             if (!running)
00092             {
00093                 running = true;
00094                 stats::get_instance()->write_started(size);
00095             }
00096         }
00097 
00098         void stop()
00099         {
00100             if (running)
00101             {
00102                 stats::get_instance()->write_finished();
00103                 running = false;
00104             }
00105         }
00106     };
00107 
00108     class scoped_read_timer
00109     {
00110         typedef unsigned_type size_type;
00111 
00112         bool running;
00113 
00114     public:
00115         scoped_read_timer(size_type size)
00116                 :running(false)
00117         {
00118             start(size);
00119         }
00120 
00121         ~scoped_read_timer()
00122         {
00123             stop();
00124         }
00125 
00126         void start(size_type size)
00127         {
00128             if (!running)
00129             {
00130                 running = true;
00131                 stats::get_instance()->read_started(size);
00132             }
00133         }
00134 
00135         void stop()
00136         {
00137             if (running)
00138             {
00139                 stats::get_instance()->read_finished();
00140                 running = false;
00141             }
00142         }
00143     };
00144 
00145     class scoped_wait_timer
00146     {
00147         bool running;
00148 
00149     public:
00150         scoped_wait_timer()
00151 
00152                 : running(false)
00153         {
00154             start();
00155         }
00156 
00157         ~scoped_wait_timer()
00158         {
00159             stop();
00160         }
00161 
00162         void start()
00163         {
00164             if (!running)
00165             {
00166                 running = true;
00167                 stats::get_instance()->wait_started();
00168             }
00169         }
00170 
00171         void stop()
00172         {
00173             if (running)
00174             {
00175                 stats::get_instance()->wait_finished();
00176                 running = false;
00177             }
00178         }
00179     };
00180 
00181 public:
00184     unsigned get_reads() const
00185     {
00186         return reads;
00187     }
00188 
00191     unsigned get_writes() const
00192     {
00193         return writes;
00194     }
00195 
00198     int64_t get_read_volume() const
00199     {
00200         return volume_read;
00201     }
00202 
00205     int64_t get_written_volume() const
00206     {
00207         return volume_written;
00208     }
00209 
00212     double get_read_time() const
00213     {
00214         return t_reads;
00215     }
00216 
00219     double get_write_time() const
00220     {
00221         return t_writes;
00222     }
00223 
00226     double get_pread_time() const
00227     {
00228         return p_reads;
00229     }
00230 
00233     double get_pwrite_time() const
00234     {
00235         return p_writes;
00236     }
00237 
00240     double get_pio_time() const
00241     {
00242         return p_ios;
00243     }
00244 
00250     double get_io_wait_time() const
00251     {
00252         return t_waits;
00253     }
00254 
00257     double get_last_reset_time() const
00258     {
00259         return last_reset;
00260     }
00261 
00263     void reset()
00264     {
00265         {
00266             boost::mutex::scoped_lock ReadLock(read_mutex);
00267 
00268             //assert(acc_reads == 0);
00269             if (acc_reads)
00270                 cout<<"Warning: " << acc_reads <<
00271                     " read(s) not yet finished"<<endl;
00272 
00273             reads = 0;
00274 
00275             volume_read = 0;
00276             t_reads = 0;
00277             p_reads = 0.0;
00278         }
00279         {
00280             boost::mutex::scoped_lock WriteLock(write_mutex);
00281 
00282             //assert(acc_writes == 0);
00283             if (acc_writes)
00284                 cout<<"Warning: " << acc_writes <<
00285                     " write(s) not yet finished"<<endl;
00286 
00287             writes = 0;
00288 
00289             volume_written = 0;
00290             t_writes = 0.0;
00291             p_writes = 0.0;
00292         }
00293         {
00294             boost::mutex::scoped_lock IOLock(io_mutex);
00295 
00296             //assert(acc_ios == 0);
00297             if (acc_ios)
00298                 cout<<"Warning: " << acc_ios <<
00299                     " io(s) not yet finished"<<endl;
00300 
00301             p_ios = 0.0;
00302         }
00303         {
00304             boost::mutex::scoped_lock WaitLock(wait_mutex);
00305 
00306             //assert(acc_waits == 0);
00307             if (acc_waits)
00308                 cout<<"Warning: " << acc_waits <<
00309                     " wait(s) not yet finished"<<endl;
00310 
00311             t_waits = 0.0;
00312             p_waits = 0.0;
00313         }
00314 
00315         last_reset = timestamp();
00316     }
00317 
00318 
00319     // for library use
00320     void write_started(unsigned size_)
00321     {
00322         double now = timestamp();
00323         {
00324             boost::mutex::scoped_lock WriteLock(write_mutex);
00325 
00326             ++writes;
00327             volume_written += size_;
00328             double diff = now - p_begin_write;
00329             t_writes += double(acc_writes) * diff;
00330             p_begin_write = now;
00331             p_writes += (acc_writes++) ? diff : 0.0;
00332         }
00333         {
00334             boost::mutex::scoped_lock IOLock(io_mutex);
00335 
00336             double diff = now - p_begin_io;
00337             p_ios += (acc_ios++) ? diff : 0.0;
00338             p_begin_io = now;
00339         }
00340     }
00341     void write_finished()
00342     {
00343         double now = timestamp();
00344         {
00345             boost::mutex::scoped_lock WriteLock(write_mutex);
00346 
00347             double diff = now - p_begin_write;
00348             t_writes += double(acc_writes) * diff;
00349             p_begin_write = now;
00350             p_writes += (acc_writes--) ? diff : 0.0;
00351         }
00352         {
00353             boost::mutex::scoped_lock IOLock(io_mutex);
00354 
00355             double diff = now - p_begin_io;
00356             p_ios += (acc_ios--) ? diff : 0.0;
00357             p_begin_io = now;
00358         }
00359     }
00360     void read_started(unsigned size_)
00361     {
00362         double now = timestamp();
00363         {
00364             boost::mutex::scoped_lock ReadLock(read_mutex);
00365 
00366             ++reads;
00367             volume_read += size_;
00368             double diff = now - p_begin_read;
00369             t_reads += double(acc_reads) * diff;
00370             p_begin_read = now;
00371             p_reads += (acc_reads++) ? diff : 0.0;
00372         }
00373         {
00374             boost::mutex::scoped_lock IOLock(io_mutex);
00375 
00376             double diff = now - p_begin_io;
00377             p_ios += (acc_ios++) ? diff : 0.0;
00378             p_begin_io = now;
00379         }
00380     }
00381     void read_finished()
00382     {
00383         double now = timestamp();
00384         {
00385             boost::mutex::scoped_lock ReadLock(read_mutex);
00386 
00387             double diff = now - p_begin_read;
00388             t_reads += double(acc_reads) * diff;
00389             p_begin_read = now;
00390             p_reads += (acc_reads--) ? diff : 0.0;
00391         }
00392         {
00393             boost::mutex::scoped_lock IOLock(io_mutex);
00394 
00395             double diff = now - p_begin_io;
00396             p_ios += (acc_ios--) ? diff : 0.0;
00397             p_begin_io = now;
00398         }
00399     }
00400     void wait_started()
00401     {
00402         double now = timestamp();
00403         {
00404             boost::mutex::scoped_lock WaitLock(wait_mutex);
00405 
00406             double diff = now - p_begin_wait;
00407             t_waits += double(acc_waits) * diff;
00408             p_begin_wait = now;
00409             p_waits += (acc_waits++) ? diff : 0.0;
00410         }
00411     }
00412     void wait_finished()
00413     {
00414         double now = timestamp();
00415         {
00416             boost::mutex::scoped_lock WaitLock(wait_mutex);
00417 
00418             double diff = now - p_begin_wait;
00419             t_waits += double(acc_waits) * diff;
00420             p_begin_wait = now;
00421             p_waits += (acc_waits--) ? diff : 0.0;
00422         }
00423     }
00424 
00425 };
